name: Control Crisis
description:
An action-fps rouglike,  Control Puts you in a randomly generated environment. Defeat enemies by using your tethers or trusty railgun, as well as the environment. Kick enemies off the edge of the map if you have to, anything to survive.

Made for the Lost Relic Game Jam

My youtube channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6Yq9ZZqVNi-UdTMtdgP0mA/about
